content.rendered:
LED Sign Board

LED signboard is the best solution for companies. In LED Signboard mostly Acrylic Letters are used for making it illuminated which is illuminated using LEDs. The outside of the panel is covered using various designs and colours of vinyl. All the LED Sign Boards are customized. If Company have enough space then they can use hollow acrylic letters, steel letters, if signage size is small then we use router cutting ACP sheet with back acrylic with LED in boxes. We are one of the best Illuminated Signs, Neon Light Signage Manufacturers in Delhi. For Base we used ACP for hiding electric wires used in connection of all Acrylic or Metal Letters. Acrylic Hollow Letters with LED should be Minimum eight inch Letters so that it perfect illuminate. 

LED sign boards prices are depend upon size of signage and design, it usually prices approx. Rs. 700/- to Rs. 950/- Per Sq. Feet if Signage Board have much Letters and design then it cost high are slightly more expensive than the other options, but are very durable with a long life-sometimes lasting for years. They are highly attractive to look at and stand out in any situation or scenario. They can be mounted on poles, on shopfronts or larger boards like banners.

If you require LED Signboards or any other kind of signage in Delhi NCR, feel free to contact Sign & Display Solutions for your needs. With several years of experience and highly talented manpower and dedicated logistics support, we are among the leading LED Signboard manufacturers in Delhi and LED signage suppliers in Delhi NCR.

Illuminated signage

Acrylic illuminated signage, its Hollow acrylic Letter with LED, Its Price is depend on Size and LED used in Letters, usually its Rs. 110/- per inch to Rs. 200/- per inch

Contact Us: 9958657208

LED Sign Board – High-Quality Custom LED Signage in Delhi NCR
LED signage is one of the most effective branding tools for businesses today. At Sign & Display Solutions, we specialize in crafting high-quality LED sign boards that enhance visibility and leave a lasting impression. Whether you’re a retail outlet, hotel, restaurant, corporate office, or institution, our illuminated signage solutions are tailored to your needs.
We offer a range of LED signage options — including acrylic letters with LED lighting, ACP base boards, router-cut name signs, and custom hollow letter signs. These boards are perfect for both indoor and outdoor applications and can be mounted on walls, poles, or large panels.

What Makes Our LED Signage Unique?

  • Acrylic LED Letters: Premium quality with backlit or front-lit effects. Minimum 8-inch height recommended for perfect glow.

  • ACP Base Panels: Ideal for hiding wiring and adding structural strength. Available with vinyl or printed backgrounds.

  • Router Cut Acrylic Boards: Best for smaller signages, cut with precision and mounted with backlit LED modules.

  • Custom Hollow Letters with LED: Perfect for businesses with large frontage — visible from a distance, professional finish.

We ensure all our LED signs are built with weatherproof materials, energy-efficient LEDs, and long-lasting durability — lasting 5+ years with minimal maintenance.

 Applications of LED Sign Boards

  • Shopfront Signs

  • Hotel & Restaurant Branding

  • Retail Stores & Showrooms

  • Corporate Office Name Boards

  • Institution & School Signage

  • Hospital and Clinic Boards

  • Wayfinding & Directional Signage

Whether you’re in Delhi, Gurgaon, or Noida, we offer on-site measurement, design customization, manufacturing, and professional installation services.

Why Choose Us?
As a trusted signage company in Delhi NCR, we combine design expertise with industrial-grade materials to deliver long-lasting and visually striking signage. Our in-house production allows us to offer faster delivery and customized options that suit your space and budget.

We’re proud to be among the most reliable LED signage companies in Delhi, with numerous projects completed in Gurgaon, Noida, and surrounding areas.
